metadata.description: AI-assisted writing skills based on Betty Flowers' four-phase framework with collaborative oscillation model

plugins.name: writing-with-agents
plugins.description: 10 specialized writing skills implementing Betty Flowers' Madman-Architect-Carpenter-Judge framework with Bryan Garner's whirlybird technique, SEO optimization, quality rubric, and multi-article content strategy. Includes 4 workflow commands for the Flowers writing cycle, content strategy, research capture, and session setup.
